## RumGlobal.stopSessionReplayRecording property

Stop Session Replay recording.

See \<a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real%5C_user%5C_monitoring/session%5C_replay/browser" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Browser Session Replay\</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

